Text.val: 04.11.2013 GB SCR18492 BAD301B: Added additional test which allow start this modul
22.04.2011 JH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
01.02.2011 GB SCR16182 Extended list of parameters in the call BAD013
01.02.2010 SH SCR15295 BAD301E Added test to avoid duplicates on TUPD
11.01.2010 SH SCR15232 BAD301E Extended INUD selection with

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INUD_INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO, INUD_INTRSTCHRG_CLNTNO from :1/INUD exception join :1/TUPH on TUPH_UPF_ADMNO = INUD_INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO and TUPH_UPF_CLNTNO = INUD_INTRSTCHRG_CLNTNO and TUPH_DATE = ':2' where INUD_INTERESTAMOUNTC <> 0 and year(INUD_DATEBOOKING) = :3 and month(INUD_DATEBOOKING) = :4 group by INUD_INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO, INUD_INTRSTCHRG_CLNTNO order by INUD_INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO, INUD_INTRSTCHRG_CLNTNO for fetch only

Text.val: -- A. Calculate the interest amount which must be charged

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INUD_INTERESTAMOUNTC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INUD where INUD_CHARGED = 'N' and INUD_INTERESTAMOUNTC <> 0 and INUD_JOURNALNO = 0 and INUD_INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO = :2 and INUD_INTRSTCHRG_CLNTNO = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Selection of invoices of current month
.. another selection with previous invoices in case of replacement

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INUD_INVO_NO from :1/INUD where INUD_INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO = :2 and INUD_INTRSTCHRG_CLNTNO = :3 and INUD_INTERESTAMOUNTC <> 0 and year(INUD_DATEBOOKING ) = :4 and month(INUD_DATEBOOKING) = :5 group by INUD_INVO_NO order by INUD_INVO_NO for fetch only

select INUP_STORNO_FROM_INVO_NO from :1/INUP join :1/INUD on INUD_INVO_NO = INUP_INVO_NO and INUD_INTRSTCHRG_ADMNO = :2 and INUD_INTRSTCHRG_CLNTNO = :3 and INUD_INTERESTAMOUNTC <> 0 and year(INUD_DATEBOOKING ) = :4 and month(INUD_DATEBOOKING) = :5 where INUP_STORNO_FROM_INVO_NO > 0 group by INUP_STORNO_FROM_INVO_NO order by INUP_STORNO_FROM_INVO_NO for fetch only

Text.val: -- Skip further updates (store TUPD), if already performed in previous
module "SelectInvoicesCurrentMonth" to avopid duplicates on TUPD
